wordGroup: short-term memory 短期记忆，短时记忆
short-term goal 短期目标；近期目标

sentences.en: We need long-term solutions, not short-term Band-Aid ones.
sentences.cn: 我们需要长远的解决方法，而不是短期的权宜之计。

sentences.en: The company has 90 staff, almost all on short-term contracts.
sentences.cn: 这家公司有90名员工，几乎全部签的是短期合同。

sentences.en: Investors weren't concerned about short-term profits over the next few years.
sentences.cn: 投资者不关心今后几年里的短期收益。
